title: FS T206 Red Cobb AB350 SGC 40 and T206 Red Cobb Cycle 460 PSA 3

posts.post_title: FS T206 Red Cobb AB350 SGC 40 and T206 Red Cobb Cycle 460 PSA 3
posts.post_content:
**cycle 460 is now sold...AB still available**

Hello Everyone..

I am posting 2 of my rare back cobbs for sale.. Both are extremely hard cards to find, especially if you are looking for a clean example. 

Please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if interested in discussing pricing on either card..

T206 Cobb American Beauty
[img]https://i.imgur.com/XxOqeaRh.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/j6GPsNfh.jpg[/img]

T206 Cobb Cycle460
[img]https://i.imgur.com/cCQ6AjJh.jpg?1[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/86EZC3xh.jpg?1[/img]
Tough back Cobbs, can’t beat that.  Great cards Jamie.

The cycle 460 is now sold. 

The American Beauty is still available.
